name: GKAchievementViewControllerDelegate
desc: An object implementing the GKAchievementViewControllerDelegate protocol is called when the user dismisses the achievements view controller. Typically, this protocol is implemented by the object in your game that originally displayed the achievements user interface.

items.name: func achievementViewControllerDidFinish(GKAchievementViewController!)
items.desc: Called when the user dismisses the achievements user interface.
